scripts.list: node -e "const GTM = require('./gtm-manager.js'); const gtm = new GTM(); gtm.initialize().then(() => gtm.listTags());"
scripts.create-tag: node -e "const GTM = require('./gtm-manager.js'); const gtm = new GTM(); gtm.initialize().then(() => gtm.createClickTrackingTag());"
scripts.help: node -e "console.log('\n GTM Tools - 驻拽转 转:'); console.log('npm run list - 爪转  转'); console.log('npm run create-tag - 爪专转 转 注拽'); console.log('npm start - 驻注转 爪 专拽');"
